00051 class SearchVariable
00052 {
00053 private:
00054         double mValue;
00056 
00058         double mConfidence;
00060         QString mName;
00062         bool mFixed;
00064 
00065         bool mCircular;
00066 
00067 public:
00068         double mMinVal, mMaxVal, mMaxJump;
00069 
00070         SearchVariable(QString name, double min, double max, double maxJump, bool circular = false);
00071         SearchVariable(const SearchVariable *v);
00072 
00073         void setValue(double v){mValue = v;}
00074         double getValue() const {return mValue;}
00075         void setFixed(bool f){mFixed = f;}
00076         bool isFixed() const {return mFixed;}
00077         void setCircular(bool c){mCircular = c;}
00078         bool isCircular() const {return mCircular;}
00079         void setRange(double min, double max){mMinVal = min; mMaxVal = max;}
00080         double getRange() const { return fabs(mMaxVal - mMinVal); }
00081         void setMaxJump(double mj){mMaxJump = mj;}
00082         void setJump(double j){mMaxJump = getRange() * j;}
00083         double getConfidence() const {return mConfidence;}
00084         void setConfidence(double c) {assert(c>=0 && c<=1);mConfidence=c;}
00085         QString getName() const {return mName;}
00086 };

00095 class SearchParameter {
00096 private:
00097         QString mName;
00098         double mValue;
00099 public:
00100         SearchParameter(const char *name, double val=0) : mName(name), mValue(val) {}
00101         SearchParameter(const SearchParameter &p) {
00102                 mName = p.mName;
00103                 mValue = p.mValue;
00104         }
00105         void set(double v){mValue = v;}
00106         double get() const {return mValue;}
00107         QString name() const {return mName;}
00108 };

00349 void VariableSet::copyValuesFrom(const VariableSet *s)
00350 {
00351         for (int i=0; i<(int)s->mVariables.size(); i++) {
00352                 mVariables[i]->setValue( s->mVariables[i]->getValue());
00353                 mVariables[i]->setFixed( s->mVariables[i]->isFixed() );
00354         }
00355         for (int i=0; i<(int)s->mParameters.size(); i++) {
00356                 mParameters[i].set( s->mParameters[i].get() );
00357         }
00358 }
00359 
00364 void VariableSet::reset()
00365 {
00366         for (int i=0; i<(int)mVariables.size(); i++) {
00367                 mVariables[i]->setValue(0);
00368                 mVariables[i]->setFixed(false);
00369                 mVariables[i]->setConfidence(0.0);
00370         }
00371 }
00372 
00373 void SearchState::copyFrom(const SearchState *s)
00374 {
00375         mHand = s->mHand;
00376         mTargetObject = s->mTargetObject;
00377         mRefTran = s->mRefTran;
00378         mEnergy = s->mEnergy;
00379         mLegal = s->mLegal;
00380         mItNumber = s->mItNumber;
00381         mDistance = s->mDistance;
00382 
00383         if (mPosture) delete mPosture;
00384         if (mPosition) delete mPosition;
00385 
00386         mPosture = PostureState::createInstance(s->mPosture->getType(), mHand);
00387         mPosture->copyValuesFrom(s->mPosture);
00388         mPosition = PositionState::createInstance(s->mPosition->getType(), mHand);
00389         mPosition->copyValuesFrom(s->mPosition);
00390 }
00391 
00392 void SearchState::reset()
00393 {
00394         mPosture->reset();
00395         mPosition->reset();
00396 }
